headline: Lam Research CEA Leti Alliance Puts AI Chip Growth Story In Focus
summary: Lam Research has entered a multi year alliance with French research institute CEA-Leti to co develop next generation specialty semiconductor technologies. The partnership focuses on advanced materials and fabrication processes for AI, high performance computing, RF and optical devices. The agreement is intended to support new device architectures for data intensive workloads and advanced communications. For investors watching NasdaqGS:LRCX, this move comes with the stock at $235.53 and...
